name: Kanjitester
tagline: A research project which generates randomized vocab and kanji tests for JLPT levels N4 and N5.
body:
# Kanji Tester As of January 2016, Kanji Tester has been retired. Many thanks to patient users over the years, I hope it's helped you in your study for the JLPT exam. The full codebase is now available on [Github](https://github.com/larsyencken/kanjitester). Feel free to contact me, or to check out my [other projects](http://lars.yencken.org/). Lars Yencken
lars@yencken.org
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
